Title: Missing Access Check
Description: Extbase request handling fails to implement a proper access check for requested controller/ action combinations, which makes it possible for an attacker to execute arbitrary Extbase actions by crafting a special request. To successfully exploit this vulnerability, an attacker must have access to at least one Extbase plugin or module action in a TYPO3 installation. The missing access check inevitably leads to information disclosure or remote code execution, depending on the action that an attacker is able to execute.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 4.3.0-alpha before 6.2.24, all versions starting from 7.0.0-alpha before 7.6.8, all versions starting from 8.0.0-alpha before 8.1.1
Solution: Upgrade to latest or apply patches.
